content: /tkartthaave! Ninne prasavicha mariyaamum, ninne maamodeesaa mukkiya yohannaanum nyangallkkuvendi ninnodapekshikkum. Nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.

items.content: Janam:- svabhaavaprakaaram maranamillaatthavanum-thante krpayaal manushyavargam muzhuvanteyum jeevanum rakshaykkum vendi vann-vishuddhiyum mahatthvavum vedippumulllla daivamaathaavaaya kanyakamariyaamilninnu shareeramedutth-bhedam koodaathe manushyanaayittheerukayum -nyangallkku vendi kurishil tharaykkappedukayum cheyth-svargeeyapithaavinte ekaputhranum-vachanavum raajaavumaaya ente kartthaave! Ninne nyaan puka zhtthum. Thante maranatthaal nyangallude maranatthe chavittikkonnavanum-vishuddha thrithvatthil oruvanum-thante pithaavinodum-jeevanulllla thante parishuddha roohaayo dum koode- orupole vandikkappettu sthuthikkappedunna vanumaaya nyangallude mashihaathampuraane!- ninne prasa vicha maathaavinteyum-ninte parishuddhanmaarellaavarudeyum praarththhanayaal-nyangall ellaavarodum karuna cheyyaname.

Janam:- basloosu emo deeletthokku
Vadkulhoon kaadeeshaiykku
Eramarmokku mor malkko-
Yeeheedoyo bro vmelse-
Daabo-shmaayono-
Hau deesau bakyone lo mo-yooso-
Kaabel veso-
Bthaibuse halophu haaye vphurkkono
Dkoole genso dabnainosho
vesgaashaam men-kaadeeshatho-vamashaabahattho-
Bsulttho dkeeso yoldaasu aaloho-mariyaam
Dlo shuhalopho-hvo barnosho-
Vesathlebu halophain masheeho aaloho-deelaan
Dabmautthe lamautthaan-
Doshe vkale-veesau-haadu men
bleesoyooso kaadistho-
Vshavyoyees-mesthu gedu vmeshthaabaahu
Am aabooy-vruhe haayo-vkaadeesho-
Hoosu alkoolaan.

content:
Nin maathaavu vishuddhanmaar
Ennivar than-praarththhanayaal
Svargapithaavinneka suthaa!
Vachanamathaam raajaadheeshaa! Ninne vaazhtthum nyaan
sahajamathaayu mrthirahithaa-kaarunyatthaal
Martthyanmaar than vargatthinu muzhuvan
Jeevanathum-rakshayumekaanaagathanaayu
Vimalatha shuchi ennivayulllla
Mahimaaviyalum daivajanithri kanya-kayaam-mariyaameennum
Bhedamathenye-maanavanaayi
Krooshithanaaya nyangallkkudayonaam-mashihaa!
Nija mrthiyaalivar than-mrthiye methichu
Nihanichone! Apparipaavana thrithaikaa
Svapithaavo-doppam jeevanezhum roohkudishaa-
Sahitham vandithane! Parikeertthithane!-krpa cheyyenam.

Bhoovilashe-sham
Daivatthaal preritharaaya shleeha-nmaar poyu
Jaathikallidayil
Bhoothalaseemayathollam nallevan-gelon
Kaikkollvor-kkokkeyezhum
Bhaagyamithe-nnariyichu;
Svargamahaa-raajyam.
(vaayanakkaaran madbahaayude nadayil vadakkubhaagatthu padi nyaarottu thirinyuninnukondu appostholapravrtthikallil ninno, pothulekhanangallil ninno vaayikkunnu.)
Vaayanakkaaran:- parishuddhashleehanmaarude nadappukallude pusthakatthil ninn. Haabeebaay, baarekmor.
Parishuddhanaaya (inna) shleehaayude pothulekhana tthil ninn. Haabeebaayu - baarekmor.
Janam: - (shleehanmaarude / shleehaayude) udayavanu sthuthi yum nammude mel thante anugrahangallum-enne-kkum undaayirikkatte.

/Tvishvasichavaraaya janakkoottatthinu ekamanassum, ekaa bhipraayavum aayirunnu. Avaril yaathoruvanum avante sampaadyangallekkurichu svantamennu paranyuvannilla. Ennaalo avarkkundaayirunna sakalavum pothu vakayaayirunnu. Shleehanmaar yeshumashihaayude uyirppi nekkurichu valiya shakthiyodukoodi saakshichukondirunnu. Avar ellaavarodum koode valiya krpayum undaayirunnu. Avarude idayil daridranaaya oruvanum undaayirunnilla. Entennaal nilangallum bhavanangallum undaayirunnavar ava vittu vila konduvannu shleehanmaarude kaalkkal vaykkukayum, ororuvanum aavashyampole nalkukayum cheythuvannu. Kuprosu deshatthuninnulllla oru levyanum, aashvaasatthinte puthran, ennarththhamulllla 'barnnabaa' ennu shleehanmaar villichirunnavanumaaya yausephinu oru nilam undaayirunnu. Avan athu vittu vila konduvannu shleehanmaarude kaalkkal vachu. Haabibaay, baarekmor.

Pau-losu shleehaa-
Dhanyanchol ketten-ithe-vam:
Ningalle nyangall ariyichathozhi-
Chingaaruvan vannariyichaal
Vaanavanengkilumaadoothan
Thaanelkkum sabhayin-shaapam.
Palatharamupadeshangallaho
Paaril mullachu parakkunnu
Daivatthinnupadesham tho-
Ttavasaanippippon dha-nyan.
(madbahaayude nadayil thekkubhaagatthu padinyaarottu thirinyuninnukondu paulosu shleehaayude lekhanam vaayikkunnu.)
Vaayanakkaaran:- paulosu shleehaa (ephessosukaarkk) ezhuthiya lekhanatthil ninn. Aahaayu baarekmor.
Janam: - shleehaayude udayavana sthuthiyum-nammudemel thante anugrahangallum-ennekkum undaayirikkatte.

/Tnammude kartthaavil bandhikkappettavanaaya nyaan ningallodapekshikkunnathentennaal, ningall villikkappetta villikku yogyamaakunna prakaaram sakala manovinayatthodum, shaantathayodum, deerghakshamayodum nadappin. Snehatthaal thammiltthammil sahikkunnavarum samaadhaanabandhatthil aathmaavinte aikyam kaatthukolllluvaan thaalparyamullllavarum aayirippin. Ningallude villiyude ekasharanatthil ningall villikkappettirikkunna prakaaram ningall ekashareeratthilum, eka aathmaavilum irippaanaayittuthanne. Entennaal oru kartthaavum oru vishvaasavum oru maamodeesaayumeyulllloo. Ellaavarudeyum pithaavum, ellaavarudemelum, ellaavarilkkoodiyum, ellaavarilum vyaaparikkunnavanum, ekadaivamaakunnu. Aahaay, baarekmor.

Janam: -haaleluyyaa! Haaleluyyaa! Sthuthiyaakunna balikall thanikkarppippin. Vedippulllla kaazhchakall edu tth-kartthaavinte praakaarangallilekku praveshichu thante vishuddha madbahaa mumpaake-kartthaavine vandippin-haa leluyyaa.

/Thaaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa.
Daabahu le-debahe dshubaho-
Shkool kurubone dkaayo-
Ul ladoraa-vo dmoriyo
Sagoodu lmoriyo kdom-madbaho dkudishe-
/thaaleluyyaa.

/Thaaleluyyaa-u-haaleluyyaa
Sthuthi balikallanacheriduvin,
Kartthr-praakaare-nirmmalakaazhchayumaayu
Kartthane sthuthichey, madbahaa mumpil
/thaaleluyyaa.

Shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Naam adakkatthodum jayatthodum vanakkatthodum chevi kodutthu nammude mumpaake vaayikkappedunna nammude kartthaaveshumashihaayude vishuddha evangeliyonile, daivatthinte jeevinulllla vachanangallude ariyippine kellkkanam.
Pattakkaaran:- (padinyaarottu thirinyu ninnukond) (shlomo lkulakoon) ningallkkellaavarkkum samaadhaanam undaayirikkatte
Janam :- avidatthe aathmaavinodukoode-daivamaaya kartthaavu nyangalleyum yogyaraakkittheerkkumaaraakatte.

Pattakkaaran :- (evangeliyon kaadeesho ...) jeevan nalkunna prasamgamaaya (suvisheshamaaya) nammude kartthaaveshumashihaayude vishuddha evangeliyon, lokatthinu jeevanum rakshayum praghoshikkunna prasamgakanaaya (inna) shleehaayilninnu (suvisheshakanaaya inna evangeli saayilninn.)

Janam :- vannavanum varuvaanirikkunnavanumaayavan vaazhtthappettavanaakunnu-nammude rakshaykkaayi thanne ayachavanu sthuthikallum naam ellaavarudeyum mel thante anugra hangallum ennekkum undaayirikkatte.

Pattakkaaran :-(bsabino hokkil ...) vishuddha kanyakamariyaamilninnu shareeriyaayittheernna daivavum, jeevante vachanavum nammude rakshakanumaaya kartthaaveshumashihaayude manushyaavathaarakaalatthu ivi iprakaaram sambhavichu.
Janam :- (athaathudivasatthe geethamo thaazhe chertthirikkunna ethengkilum oru geethamo chollunnu.)

1. Yajamaanan varumannera-tthunarvulllloraa-yu than
Muntiritthoppil paniyaayi kaanoro dha-nyaraam
/tpakalellaam than koode panithor-
/tkkavanara ketti parikarmmicheedum
Thaathanirutthum meshaykkaayu  parika-rmmikkum-suthan;
Roohu dishaa paarakkaleetthaa mudayu-nnoro-mudi
/thaaleluyyaa-choodum makudatthil.

2. Nibi-yanmaarum-jaathikallodevan ge-lon
Ariyicha-shleehanmaarum
Nayavaanmaar punyappettor
Sahadenmaar maudyaananmaar
Daivatthin maathaa thaanum
Nalla marichorkallumorkka-
Ppetteedunningavarudeyaa
Praarththhana nyangallkkeppozhum
Kottayathaayittheerenam.

3. Mooshe-aaloho mullllumara-tthilninnu
Angu villi-charull cheythu; koodaaratthinmelum
Koodeyathin ullllathilum kaikkondan adhikaaram
Haale-luyyaa uhaaleluyyaa kahanoosaa'-nadatthuka nee.

4. Parishuddhaa-layamullllil skkariyaa than-dhoopatthe
Kaikkonda-kartthaave, nin daasa-nmaare nina-
Chinnadiyaaranaykkunna ee dhoopam kaikkondu
Haale ... U haale ijanatthil nirakkaname.

5. Kartthaavarullicheythu, nyaan jeevante appam
lokatthe poshippippaan meleennum va-nnu
/tthaathanayachu vachanamaamenne
/tkarshakaneppol - gabreeyel vithachu
Nallanilam thulyam mariyaam kaikkondaalludare
Doothasamaanam thronosil - pattakkaar kaiyil
/thaaleluyyaa - ghoshicheedunnu.

6. Akhilam nyaanaaraa-nyittum
Daivabhayatthe mikachonnum
Nyaan darshi-chilla; thal sneha-tthaale
Dhaarmmikanaam yauseppaarnnu mesrem raaja-thvam
Mahithan moosha vibhaagichaan vadiyaal vaari-dhiye
/thaananiyaadyaanmaa-rathinaa-l
/tagniyil ninnum rakshitharaa-y
Thangkatthekkaallathu-kaamyam, madhuvilumathu madhuram-paaram
Daivaaraa-dhanaye snehippo-n dhanyan.
Pattakkaaran:- naam ellaavarum praarththhichu kartthaavinodu karunayum dayavum yaachikkanam.
Janam :- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheythu nyangalle sahaayikkaname.
Pattakkaaran :- sthuthiyum sthothravum, praabhavavum pukazhchayum, maanyupokaattha…

Shushrooshakkaaran:- baarekmor. Anugrahikkunnavanaaya kartthaavinte mumpaakeyum punyam nalkunna balipeedhatthinte mumpaakeyum divyavum svargeeyavumaaya ee vishuddharahasyangallude mumpaakeyum bhayangkaramaaya ee vishuddha kurbbaanayude mumpaakeyum (bahumaanappetta pattakkaarante) kaikallaal kunturukkam vaykkappedunnu. Naam ellaavarum praarththhichu kartthaavinodu anugrahangallum karunayum yaachikkanam.
Janam :- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave, nyangallodu karuna cheythu nyangalle sahaayikkaname.
Janam :- aammeen. Kartthaavu avidatthe shushroosha kaikkollllukayum avidatthe praarththhanakallaal nyangalle sahaayikkukayum cheyyumaa-raakatte.
Pattakkaaran :- (mennaalohonu kaabel ) daiva tthilninnu kadangallkku parihaaravum, paapangallkku mochanavum, randu lokangallilum ennekkum naam kaikkollllumaaraakatte.

Pattakkaaran :- (kaadeeshu ...) jeevanum vishuddhiyumulllla roohaa parishuddhan. Thaan nammude aathmaakkallude melum nammude pithaakkanmaarudeyum sahodarangalludeyum nethaakkalludeyum gurukkanmaarudeyum marichupoyavarudeyum vishuddhasabhayude makkallaaya vishvaasikallaaya vaangippoyavarudeyum aathmaakkalludemelum randu lokangallilum ennennekkum manassalivu thonni karuna cheythukondu paapiyaaya thante daasante dhoopatthe shuddheekarikkunnu. Bathraihun olme la o-lam olmeen.
Shushrooshakkaaran :- baarekmor, divyajnyaanam shraddhichukondu naam ellaavarum nallavannam ninnu bahumaanappetta (pattakkaarante) praarththhana ettuchollanam.

2. Unnatha padaviyileriyithaa
innippoll (pattakkaaran)
Anubhavicheedunnorkkaayi
Anushdhikkunnee kurbbaana.

3. Priyare ithu karunayudeyum
Alivinteyum samayam thaan
Sathyasnehatthode samaa-
Dhaanam nalkum samayam thaan.

4. Doorasthhar savidhasthharu maayu
Thammil nirakkum samayam thaan
Athinaal sodarare varuvin,
Orupol karunayiranneedaam.

5. Naathhaa! Krpa cheytheedaname
Naathhaa! Krpa cheyyuka kanivaal
Naathhaa! Uttharamarullicheyu
Thadiyaarodu krpa cheyyaname.

6. Nallavane, nyangade balahee-
Nathayoduttharamarullaname
Naamellaavarumotthorumi-
Chattahasichura cheyyenam.
